thailand.title: Fantastic 10 Days Thailand Tour Package
thailand.tagline: A Journey to Bliss in the Himalayas
thailand.about:
Embark on an unforgettable 10-day journey through Thailand with our captivating tour package, promising an immersive experience across the country's most enchanting destinations. From the moment you arrive in Phuket and seamlessly transfer to Krabi, you'll be captivated by Thailand's natural beauty.

The tour highlights include an exhilarating 4 Island Tour by Speed Boat. Discover the stunning beauty of Phranang Cave Beach, Tup Island, Poda Island, and Chicken Island. Immerse yourself in crystal-clear waters, relax on pristine beaches, and enjoy thrilling water sports. The Phi Phi Island Tour is another highlight, featuring Maya Bay and Monkey Beach, surrounded by breathtaking limestone caves.

Exploring Phuket during the City Tour offers visits to Karon View Point, Wat Chalong Temple, and the iconic Buddha Statue of Phuket. In Pattaya, get mesmerized by the renowned Alcazar Show, a cultural extravaganza. The Coral Island Tour offers snorkeling and sea walker diving amidst vibrant marine life.

At Safari World and Marine Park, get up close to exotic animals in open-air zoos and enjoy entertaining dolphin and sea lion shows. It's a day packed with excitement and joy.

In Bangkok, delve into the city's rich heritage with temple visits and a visit to the dazzling Gems Gallery showcasing precious stones. The tour culminates with a full day at Safari World and Marine Park, making for a spectacular finale to this extraordinary journey.

Our Fantastic 10-Day Thailand Tour Package promises cherished memories and unparalleled experiences. Thailand's awe-inspiring landscapes, cultural treasures, and family-friendly adventures await. Don't miss this chance to create lasting memories with your loved ones.

itinerary.title: Arrive In Phuket. Transfer To Krabi.
itinerary.description:
• After having your breakfast at the hotel, pack your bag and board your transfers to Bangkok
  • Upon reaching Bangkok, check in to your hotel and head out to explore Bangkok.
  • On this tour, you will visit some of the famous temples like the Golden Buddha Temple, and Temple of the Emerald Buddha.
  • We will also take you to the dazzling Gems Gallery, where you can shop for some precious and semi-precious stones.
  • Upon completing the city tour, return back to your hotel.
  • Overnight stay in Bangkok.

itinerary.title: 4 Island Tour by Speed Boat.
itinerary.description:
• Post breakfast in the morning, get ready to spend an amazing day in the ocean.
  • Board your transfers to the starting point of your speed boat.
  • Hop on to your speedboat and spend the day exploring the scenic islands around Krabi.
  • On this tour, you will visit the scenic Phranang Cave Beach, Tup Island, Poda Island and Chicken Island.
  • You will also take a small stopover in between to have your lunch.
  • Spend this day exploring the secluded beaches, admiring the limestone rock formations or sit leisurely by the beach watching the blue ocean.
  • Adventure couples can indulge in some fun water activities and discover more about each other while spending quality time in this romantic setting.
  • After exploring all the islands, return back to the mainland of Thailand.
  • Upon reaching, you will be transferred back to your hotel.
  • Overnight stay in Krabi.

itinerary.title: Krabi to Phuket. Cabaret Show in the evening.
itinerary.description:
• After having your breakfast in the morning, get ready for the day.
  • You will then board your transfers to Phuket.
  • Reach Phuket, check-in to the hotel and have some rest.
  • In the evening, watch the graceful movements of the artists as you enjoy the Simon Cabaret Show in Phuket.
  • Overnight stay in Phuket.

itinerary.title: Phi Phi Island Tour.
itinerary.description:
• Wake up to a beautiful tropical morning and have your breakfast at the hotel.
  • Next, get ready and board your transfers to the starting point of your speed boat.
  • Hop on to your speedboat and spend the day exploring the scenic Phi Phi islands.
  • Enjoy this day with your partner as you spend some leisure time gliding through the ocean waters.
  • Upon reaching the Phi Phi Islands, you will visit some of the iconic locations like the Maya Bay and some stunning limestone caves.
  • You can also stroll hand in hand on the scenic Monkey Beach.
  • You will also take a small stopover in between to have your lunch.
  • After exploring all the islands, return back to the mainland of Thailand.
  • Upon reaching, you will be transferred back to your hotel.
  • Overnight stay in Phuket.

itinerary.title: Phuket City Tour. Evening at Leisure.
itinerary.description:
• Have your breakfast in the morning and get ready to explore Phuket.
  • Board your transfers for the day, which will take you to some iconic landmarks across Phuket.
  • On this city tour, you will visit the famous Karon View Point to admire stunning views of the crescent-shaped Kata and Kata Noi Beaches.
  • You will also visit the historic Wat Chalong Temple and the famous Buddha Statue of Phuket.
  • Upon completing the city tour, you can spend the rest of the day at leisure.
  • Overnight stay in Phuket.

itinerary.title: Phuket to Bangkok. Evening Dinner Cruise.
itinerary.description:
• After having your breakfast at the hotel, pack your bag and board your transfers to the airport.
  • You will then board a 2-hour flight to Bangkok.
  • Upon reaching Bangkok, meet our representative who will transfer you to your hotel in Bangkok.
  • Upon reaching, check-in to your hotel and rest for some time.
  • In the evening, we will take you to enjoy a romantic dinner on a luxury cruise through the Chao Phraya River.
  • Marvel at the beautiful skyline of Thailand and enjoy the live performances.
  • Relish in the delicious buffet dinner in a perfect romantic setting.
  • After completing your dinner, return back to your hotel.
  • Overnight stay in Bangkok.

itinerary.title: Bangkok City Tour and Temple Tour.
itinerary.description:
• Wake up to a beautiful morning in Bangkok and have your breakfast.
  • Next, get ready to explore the iconic landmarks of Bangkok as you embark on a city tour today.
  • Board your transfers to begin your city tour.
  • On this tour, you will visit some of the famous temples like the Golden Buddha Temple, and Temple of the Emerald Buddha.
  • We will also take you to the dazzling Gems Gallery, where you can shop some precious and semi-precious stones.
  • Upon completing the city tour, return back to your hotel and have some rest.
  • Overnight stay in Bangkok.

itinerary.title: Departure. Take back a lot of romantic memories.
itinerary.description:
• Have your breakfast in the morning and pack your bags.
  • Board your transfer to Bangkok Airport for your onward journey.
  • Your amazing Thailand Honeymoon Tour concludes once you are dropped off at the airport.
  • Take back a lot of happy memories to cherish for a lifetime.

dubai.title: 6 Days Dubai Tour Package With Abu Dhabi With Flights
dubai.tagline: From Humble Origins to a Cultural Marvel
dubai.about:
Unveiling Dubai's Transformation: A Fusion of Traditions and Wonders

Dubai, a city that epitomizes grandeur, innovation, and cultural richness, has evolved from a humble fishing village into a global icon. The cityscape offers a myriad of wonders, from the awe-inspiring Burj Khalifa to the exhilarating rides on the fastest roller coasters. It's a living canvas that showcases the transformation from vast desert plains to a bustling cultural hub.

A Tale of Contrasts and Grandeur
Dubai is a world of contrasts. Lavish shopping centers stand tall alongside stunning architectural marvels. The city embodies opulence, yet retains its essence in Emirati culture, reflected in the bustling backstreets, mesmerizing mosques, and delectable cuisine. Every facet adds depth to this extraordinary experience.

Embarking on a City Tour: Dubai's Multifaceted Charm
Explore the diversity of Dubai through a city tour that unveils its multifaceted charm. From the awe-inspiring Burj Khalifa to immersive desert nights steeped in culture, the tour offers glimpses of the Persian Gulf's grandeur, including the iconic Palm Islands. Architectural wonders, vibrant mosques, and the captivating Dubai Fountain Show await your discovery.

The Thrill of Ras al Khaimah: An Adventure Haven
Venture into Ras al Khaimah, nestled in the Al Hajar mountains, a haven for adventure enthusiasts. Here, adrenaline reigns supreme, offering tours to Jebel Jais, the world's highest mountain peak, and the thrill of the longest zipline. Untouched landscapes reveal mountain farms and communities, showcasing the region's pristine beauty.

Join Us for a Luxurious Emirati Experience
Join our group trip to Dubai from Mumbai and immerse yourself in the luxurious embrace of Emirati culture. Don't miss this incredible opportunity to explore a city that blends opulence, tradition, and modernity in a seamless tapestry.

itinerary.title: Arrive in Dubai. Evening Marina Dinner Cruise.
itinerary.description:
• Upon your arrival at the Dubai Airport and meet our representative who will help you board your transfers.
  • Reach your hotel in Dubai, check in and rest for a while.
  • In the evening head to the Dubai Marina to embark on a Dinner Cruise through the creek.
  • Enjoy the surrounding views of the Dubai Skyline with flavourful dishes from all over the world along with Tanoura Show and Belly Dance.
  • After enjoying the cruise dinner experience, head back to the hotel.
  • Overnight stay at the hotel in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Dubai City Tour - Burj Khalifa (124th Floor With Café Pass) - Dubai Mall - Fountain Show.
itinerary.description:
• Post breakfast, get ready for the city tour.
  • Board the transfers that will take you through the famous Sheik Zayed Road which is lined with some of the prominent landmarks.
  • On this tour, enjoy the panoramic view of Jumeirah Mosque, Burj Al Arab Hotel View, the Palm, Atlantis Hotel and Jumeirah Beach.
  • Later, transfer to the tallest building in the world - the Burj Khalifa.
  • From the top of the 124th floor of Burj Khalifa, get a glimpse into the city beneath and beyond!
  • Next, explore the Dubai Mall, a mall like no other, along with the musical fountain show.

itinerary.description:
• Wake up and have your breakfast at the hotel.

  • During this time you can visit some iconic landmarks in Dubai like Dubai Frame or the Miracle Garden.
  • Around 3:30 pm board your transfers for an exciting Desert Safari, just like the famous Arabian Nights.
  • Upon reaching, hit the golden sands and indulge in activities like camel Safari, Dune Bashing, etc.
  • After the safari enjoys activities like shisha, Belly dance show, Tanura show, and Fire show followed by BBQ dinner.
  • Return back to your hotel for an overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Day Excursion to Abu Dhabi. Visit Ferrari World. Indian Dinner at an Indian Restaurant
itinerary.description:
• Post breakfast, get ready for the Abu Dhabi city tour by 8 am.
  • Upon reaching Abu Dhabi, we will first visit the Sheik Zayed Mosque - one of the largest and most beautiful mosques in the world.
  • Next, we will spend the rest of the day at the Ferrari World with a One Day One Park ticket (park timings 11 am to 8 pm).
  • After spending a fun day at the Ferrari World, enjoy an Indian Dinner on the way to Dubai.
  • Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Leisure Day | DIY
itinerary.description:
• Have your breakfast in the morning and spend the rest of the day at leisure.
  • You can choose from a number of activities which will be an add-on cost to the trip.
  • Here are a few things you can do Aquaventure Waterpark, Sky Diving at the Palm, Ain Dubai, Shopping at the Global Village, Dubai Heritage Village, and Water Activities at Jumeirah Beach
  • After completing your sightseeing, return back to the hotel.

itinerary.title: Visit the Lost Chamber Aquarium. Departure.
itinerary.description:
• Post breakfast in the morning, pack your bags are check-out from the hotel.
  • Visit the Lost Chamber Aquarium which has a spectacular collection of tropical marine life.
  • Explore and see radiant reef fish, seahorses, rays, sharks and countless other creatures.
  • You will also visit the Ambassadors Lagoon for an amazing underwater experience.
  • Later, board your transfers to the Dubai airport.
  • Your amazing Dubai Tour concludes once you are dropped off at the airport.
  • Continue your onward journey with a lot of happy memories from Dubai.

maldives.title: 5 Days Maldive Tour Package With Customized Resort
maldives.tagline: A paradise of sun, sand, and smiles indeed
maldives.about:
The Maldives, a paradise on Earth, beckons with its azure waters, coral islands, and luxury beyond compare. Our Maldives Tour Packages offer a seamless blend of relaxation and adventure, ensuring an unforgettable escape to this tropical haven. From romantic getaways to family-friendly vacations, our meticulously crafted itineraries cater to diverse preferences.

Indulge in the lap of luxury with overwater bungalows, where the gentle lull of the waves becomes your lullaby. Snorkel amidst vibrant coral reefs, discovering the underwater wonders that make the Maldives a diver's dream. Our Maldives Packages from India provide convenient flights, comfortable accommodations, and an array of experiences tailored to your liking.

For couples seeking a romantic retreat, our Maldives Honeymoon Packages promise intimate moments against the backdrop of breathtaking sunsets. Picture private dinners on the beach, spa treatments for two, and leisurely strolls on pristine shores.

Families can create lasting memories with our Maldives Family Packages, designed to cater to all ages. Enjoy water sports, island-hopping, and engaging activities that ensure everyone has a fantastic time in this tropical wonderland.

The Maldives, with its unique charm and warm hospitality, awaits your discovery. Allow our Maldives Tour Packages to be your guide to this slice of paradise, where every moment is a celebration of life, love, and luxury. Dive into the beauty of the Maldives and let the memories created here linger in your heart forever.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Maldives
itinerary.description:
• Welcome to the tropical paradise of Maldives! After reaching there, get transferred by a speedboat/sea plane to your resort check-in to your room.
  • Spend the day relaxing and admiring the views of crystal clear waters ebbing sandy beaches.

itinerary.title: Day at leisure | Optional Water sports
itinerary.description:

itinerary.title: Day at Leisure | Optional activity: Night Fishing
itinerary.description:
• Wake up and head for a fulfilling breakfast and spend the day chilling at the resort and relaxing around the beach.
  • Our special recommendation for today is Maldives favorite traditional activity-Night fishing.
  • Using hand lines and raw fish as bait, this has all the ingredients for an adventurous family outing. Catch some nocturnal fish under the beautiful starlit sky.
  • The ambiance, the mood everything is so magical and we assure you will enjoy this rare experience to the hilt.
  • Return to your hotel after this truly exciting adventure and rest overnight as you pack your bags to return home tomorrow.

sri-lanka.title: Wonders Of Sri Lanka - 8 Days Sri Lanka Tour Package
sri-lanka.tagline: Discover the Jewel of the Indian Ocean with Our Sri Lanka Tour Packages
sri-lanka.about:
Unveiling the Enchantment of Sri Lanka - Your Tropical Island Paradise Awaits!
    Embark on a breathtaking journey to Sri Lanka, the Jewel of the Indian Ocean, with our curated Sri Lanka Tour Packages. This dazzling island nation is a tapestry of wonders, where pristine beaches shimmer like scattered diamonds, emerald rainforests teem with vibrant life, and ancient rock formations rise like mystical guardians. From the frothy crests of turquoise waves to the mist-shrouded peaks, Sri Lanka promises an unforgettable tapestry of experiences.
    UNESCO Treasures
    Immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of Sri Lanka's heritage, dotted with UNESCO World Heritage Sites that whisper tales of a bygone era.
        Sigiriya Fortress: Ascend the iconic Lion Rock, marveling at the 360-degree panorama that unfolds beneath your feet. This ancient marvel of urban planning offers a glimpse into a glorious past.
    Dambulla Caves: Step into a wonderland of devotion at the Dambulla Caves, a sprawling complex adorned with intricate carvings of Buddha, Hindu deities, and ancient kings.
    Kandy: Embrace the spiritual aura of Kandy, a sacred city cradling the venerated Tooth Relic temple, a treasure revered by Buddhists worldwide.
 Wildlife Encounters
 Unleash your inner explorer and delve into the untamed beauty of Sri Lanka's wilderness.
    Minneriya National Park: Embark on an unforgettable jeep safari through the golden grasslands of Minneriya National Park. Keep your eyes peeled for majestic Asiatic elephants, elusive leopards, and a kaleidoscope of birdlife.
    Turtle Hatchery: Witness the miracle of life at the Bentota turtle hatchery, where you can learn about the fascinating lifecycle of these gentle giants.
 City Delights
 Beyond the natural wonders, Sri Lanka's bustling metropolises offer unique charms.
    Colombo: Dive into the vibrant pulse of Colombo, the commercial capital, where modern skyscrapers mingle with colonial relics and bustling street markets.
    Nuwara Eliya: Escape to the cool embrace of Nuwara Eliya, nestled amidst verdant hills. Renowned for its Ceylon tea plantations, this town offers a timeless charm.
 Sri Lanka beckons with a kaleidoscope of adventures – from sun-kissed beaches to verdant rainforests, ancient ruins to thrilling safaris. Let our Sri Lanka Tour Packages guide you on an unforgettable journey through this island paradise, where every corner promises a story waiting to be unveiled.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Sri Lanka. Transfer to Dambulla, en route visit Elephant Orphanage.
itinerary.description:
• Arrive in Sri Lanka and clear your immigration and visa formalities at the airport.
  • Meet your chauffeur and get transferred to Dambulla.
  • On the way, we will take you to the Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage wherein you can feed and bathe the elephants.
  • Reach Dambulla which is famous for its tropical forest, rock formations and ancient temples.
  • Overnight stay in Dambulla.

itinerary.title: Explore Sigiriya Rock Fortress. Jeep Safari in the tropical forest.
itinerary.description:
• After having an early breakfast, get ready to proceed to Sigiriya Rock Fortress which is a UNESCO World Heritage site.
  • We will have to climb around 1200 steps to reach the top and further explore this magnificent ancient town.
  • Next, we head towards the Minneriya National Park for a thrilling jeep safari to watch the tropical wildlife of Sri Lanka closely.
  • Overnight stay in Habarana.

itinerary.title: Habarana to Kandy via Dambulla Cave. Kandy City Tour.
itinerary.description:
• Have your breakfast at the hotel and board your transfer to Kandy.
  • On the way we will take a short stopover to explore the Dambulla Cave Temple, another UNESCO World Heritage Site that can be accessed by climbing 300 stairs. (optional)
  • Reach the Sacred City of Kandy - a UNESCO World Heritage Site to enjoy the Kandy City Tour.
  • Later, Visit the temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic, where the left canine tooth of Gautama Buddha is enshrined.
  • Overnight stay in Kandy.

itinerary.title: Kandy to Nuwara Eliya. City Tour of Nuwara Eliya and around.
itinerary.description:
• Post breakfast at the hotel, transfer to Nuwara Eliya.
  • Check-in at the hotel and head out to visit the Ramboda waterfall for a natural retreat.
  • Next, we will learn about the tea manufacturing process by visiting the aromatic tea plantations and a tea factory.
  • Later, visit the Sri Baktha Hanuman Temple on a small hilltop 30 kms from Nuwara Eliya.
  • Return back to Nuwara Eliya to embark on a city tour.
  • Conclude the day by seeking the blessings of goddess Sita at the Seetha Amman Temple, one of the important shrines of the Ramayana circuit in Sri Lanka.
  • Overnight stay in Nuwara Eliya.

itinerary.title: Nuwara Eliya to Bentota. Day at leisure
itinerary.description:
• Post breakfast at the hotel, transfer to Bentota.
  • Check-in and spend the rest of the day at leisure.
  • You can go around exploring this coastal town or sit leisurely by the beach.
  • Overnight stay in Bentota.

itinerary.title: Explore Bentota. Visit Turtle Hatchery and Madu Ganga boat ride.
itinerary.description:
• Have your breakfast at the hotel and travel to Kosgoda.
  • Visit the Turtle Hatchery to understand the life cycle of sea turtles right from birth.
  • Further, we have arranged a pleasant boat ride in Madu Ganga for relaxation.
  • Overnight stay in Bentota.

itinerary.title: Bentota to Colombo. City Tour and Shopping in Colombo.
itinerary.description:
• Have your breakfast at the hotel in Bentota.
  • Next, board your transfers to Colombo - the capital city.
  • Check-in and we will then begin our Colombo city tour which will take us through the major attractions in the city.
  • We have planned this evening for you to indulge in a shopping spree.
  • Overnight stay in Colombo.

itinerary.title: Departure with a lot of memories to cherish.
itinerary.description:
• After breakfast at the hotel, proceed to the airport for your onward journey.
  • Your tour concludes once we drop you off at the airport.

singapore.title: Best of Singapore in 5 Days
singapore.tagline: A paradise of sun, sand, and smiles indeed
singapore.about:
Imagine a journey that takes you into a world of wonders – that's the magic of our Singapore tour. From the moment you arrive, be ready to be swept off your feet. Step into a realm of excitement as you embark on the captivating Night Safari. Witness animals come alive in their nocturnal habitat, creating unforgettable memories.

The heart of Singapore beckons with a vibrant city tour. Discover iconic landmarks like the Merlion Statue and the stunning Marina Floating Bay. Sentosa Island invites you to embrace adventure. Glide over the island on a cable car, race down thrilling Luge tracks, and be dazzled by the Wings of Time spectacle.

Find yourself atop the world at Sands Sky Park Observation Deck, gazing upon the stunning skyline. Gardens by the Bay mesmerizes with its surreal Supertrees and lush domes, evoking awe and joy.

Relaxation is woven into the fabric of this journey. A day of leisure lets you explore Singapore your way – bask on beautiful beaches, dive into Universal Studios' fun, or immerse in interactive museums.

As you depart, a treasure trove of joyful memories accompanies you. Our Singapore tour isn't just a trip; it's a symphony of adventure, relaxation, and happiness. Let these memories be the stars that light up your heart for years to come.

itinerary.title: Arrive In Singapore. Embark On The Night Safari Tour.
itinerary.description:
• Upon your arrival in Singapore, complete the immigration process at the airport.
  • Meet our representative, who will help you board your transfers to your hotel.
  • Upon reaching, check in to your hotel and have some rest.
  • In the evening, head out to the Nocturnal Zoo of Singapore.
  • Enjoy a thrilling Night Safari tour as you visit the 7 different zones in the park and watch the animals closely.
  • Upon completing the Night Safari, head back to your hotel.
  • Overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Singapore City Tour. Evening at Sentosa Island.
itinerary.description:
• Have your breakfast in the morning and get ready for the day.
  • Board your transfers for your Singapore City Tour.
  • On this city tour, you will visit some of the major landmarks in Singapore.
  • You will visit places like Art Science Museum, the iconic Merlion Statue, the scenic Marina Floating Bay, and the Helix Bridge.
  • Upon completing the sightseeing, head out to have some fun on Sentosa Island.
  • Start off by taking a scenic cable car ride, where you can marvel at the surrounding sea views.
  • You will also spend some quality time together by enjoying a Skyride where you can marvel at the panoramic vistas of the entire island.
  • Have some fun with your partner as you glide down the island on a Luge, which is a fun activity to explore around.
  • Post evening, get captivated by the famous laser, fountain and fireworks show - the Wings of Time, which is set against the backdrop of an open sea.
  • Upon completing the day’s sightseeing, return back to your hotel.
  • Overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Sands Sky Park Observation Deck. Gardens by the Bay.
itinerary.description:
• Post breakfast in the morning, head out to have a fun day.
  • Start by visiting the Sands Sky Park Observation Deck located on the top of 57 floored Marina Bay Sands buildings.
  • You can spend some peaceful time watching the stunning views of Singapore Skyline meet the sky at the horizon.
  • Later, in the afternoon, enjoy your visit to the Gardens By the Bay.
  • Stroll through the enchanting landscape of the flower and cloud dome here.
  • Enjoy the refreshing atmosphere here with cascading waterfalls, a mist-filled ambiance and a unique collection of plants from around the world.
  • Spend some time admiring the futuristic Supertrees that light up dazzling against the night sky.
  • After enjoying this amazing day, return back to your hotel.
  • Overnight stay in Sentosa Island.

itinerary.title: Day at Laisure in Singapore.
itinerary.description:
• After having your breakfast at the hotel in the morning, you can spend the rest of the day leisurely.
  • On this leisure day, you can choose to explore Singapore on your own.
  • You can visit the pristine beaches, spend the day having fun at Universal Studios, Visit the interactive museums in Singapore, and much more.
  • Overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Departure. Take back a lot of happy memories.
itinerary.description:
• Have your breakfast in the morning and pack your bags.
  • Board your transfer to Changi Airport for your onward journey.
  • Your amazing Singapore Tour concludes once you are dropped off at the airport.
  • Take back a lot of happy memories to cherish for a lifetime.
